channel.title: Please someone help this is urgent!
channel.description:
My computer Had a Virus and my friend gave me this Window Restarter and he gave me my computer back and now that i know how to make a private server my windows Firewall won't open it says the following - "window firewall setting cannot be displayed because the associated service is not running. Do you want to start the windows firewall/ internet connection sharing (ICS) service?
-then is say's to click yes- i click yes and this option comes up
-windows cannot start firewall/internet connection sharing (ICS) service-
then a page opens that says "ok" - i click it and then the message closes can some help , what do i do please someone give there time up for this.

item.title: Please someone help this is urgent!
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

Do these steps

  1. Start>run
  2. Type “services.msc” ( if your in vista search services)
  3. Now you shoudl end up with a screen that looks like this

  1. Scroll down to “windows fierwall” and double click it

  2. Now you shoudl end up with a screen that looks like this

  1. Choose automatic form the drop down box

  2. Click start

This should help ya out

Read full topic
item.source: Please someone help this is urgent!
